sentences.en: GENERAL EURO - pox M PE 06, is an excellentmulti - purpose epoxy primer.
sentences.cn: 总述PE06是优异的 多用途 环氧底漆,由改性环氧树脂和颜料制成的.

sentences.en: I borrowed from the library a primer of phonetics.
sentences.cn: 我从图书馆借了一本语音学入门书.

sentences.en: Imagine the face of Philip or Alexander at hearing of a Primer of Macedonian Literature!
sentences.cn: 想一想,菲利普或亚历山大听到有所谓马其顿文学入门,脸上会有什么表情罢!

sentences.en: It a silky pink primer that makes skin appear smoother & brighter.
sentences.cn: 这款丝绸般柔滑的粉红色底霜可以让肌肤变得更加幼滑 和 明亮.

sentences.en: It is intended as a brief primer on the software testing process.
sentences.cn: 本文意在成为讲解软件测试过程的简明的入门读本.

sentences.en: It's a two - component , reinforced etch primer, containing phosphoric acid and corrosion - inhibitive pigments.
sentences.cn: 一种含有磷酸和 防腐蚀 颜料的双组份加强型磷化底漆.

sentences.en: It's a two - component , solvent - borne , modified zinc silicate shop primer.
sentences.cn: 是一种双组份溶剂基改性硅酸锌车间底漆.

sentences.en: It's a two - component, chromate free, epoxy polyamide adduct shop primer especially designed.
sentences.cn: 是一种不含铬的双组份环氧聚酰胺加成物的车间底漆.

sentences.en: Marks to be painted with color contrasting with primer.
sentences.cn: 标识用漆应采用与底漆有反差的颜色.

sentences.en: The bare metal was sprayed with several coats of primer.
sentences.cn: 裸露的金属上被喷上了几层底漆。

sentences.en: This monograph is a primer to coal and biomass gasification technologies.
sentences.cn: 这个专题著作是煤和生物量气化技术的一本入门.

sentences.en: This paper introduces the properties and application of this primer to boilers.
sentences.cn: 文章总结了涂料用于锅炉部件时的一些涂装工艺问题.

sentences.en: This paper introduces theand application of this primer to boilers.
sentences.cn: 文章总结了这种涂料用于锅炉部件时的一些涂装工艺问题.

sentences.en: To this world Al Jazeera English offers a useful primer.
sentences.cn: 半岛电视台的英语频道为我们提供了有益启示.

sentences.en: You wait, with your weapon pointed in a safe direction, cos the primer burns slow.
sentences.cn: 你等着, 枪指着安全的方向, 因为引信还在烧着.
